title: The Society of Unrelenting Vigilance
description: Murder, mystery, and adventure aren’t your typical birthday presents . . .But for Theo, anything that breaks up his ordinary routine is the perfect gift.A mysterious “illness” and Theo’s guardians force him into a life indoors, where gloves must be worn and daily medical treatments are the norm. When Theo discovers a suspicious package on his birthday, one person from the past will unlock the secret behind Theo’ s “illness” and change his life forever.Molded into an exhilarating steampunk adventure that gives birth to the next great fantasy hero, Theo Wickland, Candle The Society of Unrelenting Vigilance is the first book in a trilogy by debut author Glenn Dakin.Ages 8-12
author: Glenn Dakin
